title: Jhin's kit literally has completely danced right around a current champion's kit
body:
And no one else but me is upset about it.

I used to fucking main this champion and he was my fave.

Then he was gutted into oblivion, given a passive that completely goes against what his design stands for, an unreliable cC, a shit passive that "restores mana so he is mana effecient" while having fucking 2-3x the mana costs on his basic abilities... 

Oh and his ult is useless as can be 80% of the time unless you're a scripter. Which I'm not, so it's useless 80% of the time. 


Rest. In. Friggin. Peace.
